title: Can you use an iPhone 4S in 2020? - Quora

response.answer_text: Well I’m still using my lovely black iPhone 4s in 2020!and I should say that I’m using this as my main phone… but there is somethings that you need to know…I mean there are some issues but I don’t really care! the first and the main problem is there is no software update and the latest available iOS is 9.3.6! it means you have to use the older version of some apps like instagram but I just use it for checking and posting sometimes (I don’t share all my life on instagram) so it’s usable! and whatsapp and telegram can work properly on iPhone 4s in 2020 (I don’t have any problem using them) it’s still so good for listening to music,texting,checking mails and other works like that! you can not play with it because the new games won’t install on it but I don’t have any problem with that too…(I’m not a gamer) you can’t pair it with apple watch but I don’t have any so doesn’t matter :) anyway I’m still using it as my main phone and don’t have much problem with that but if you want to buy one…I don’t recommend at all!
